p: The basal medium was prepared using the formation described by Murashige and Skoog [ 14] which is referred to as MS basal medium. The basal medium was supplemented with 30 g/L sucrose and 3.0 g/L Gelrite as a gelling agent with the pH adjusted to 5.75 prior to the autoclave. The basal medium was autoclaved for 20 min at 121 °C at a pressure of 1.05 kg cm −2.
